statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT M1.HANBAIIN_CD ,M1.HANBAIIN_NM ,M1.HANBAIINKANA_NM ,M1.HANBAIIN_KB ,M1.HANBAIINTENPO_CD ,M1.HANYOHANBAIIN_FLG ,M1.ADD_YMD ,M1.ADD_TM ,M1.ADDTAN_CD ,M1.UPD_YMD ,M1.UPD_TM ,M1.UPD_TANCD ,M1.SAKUJYO_YMD ,M1.SAKUJYO_FLG ,M1.JYUSIN_YMD ,M1.JYUSIN_TM FROM BOMT0030 M1 WHERE M1.HANBAIIN_CD =
